An additional proof <s> of the identity<\s> that one
cause has produced both the Foliation and Cleavage is
found in the continuation of the same divisional planes
<s> in the same direction<s> through Clay Slate & Mica
Schist from Loch Katterin to Glean Shee; these are
<s>plan being <\s> alternately planes of cleavage in the Slate
& of foliation in the Schist; <s>as the deflection of the<\s>
the boundary line between the formations being deflected
while the divisional planes keep a direct course
& pass from one rock to the other several times without
changing their direction or their inclination. When
Professor Sedgwick announced the persistence of
cleavage planes through beds of different mineral
character it was at once admitted that the
uniform cleavage of the the various beds must
be regarded as one process. There is the same
reason for connecting together foliation & cleavage
now that the foliation of the Schist is shown
to be continuous with the cleavage of the Slates.
For these reasons the two phenomena <s>are<\s> will now be described
together
<u>Geographical arrangement of the Foliation & Cleavage<\u>
